data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Cercle Brugge get the game underway.
Evgen Makarenko (Kortrijk) has received a yellow card from Christof Dierick.
In the minute 31, Kristof D'Haene (Kortrijk) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
At Jan Breydel Stadium, Johanna Omolo has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Charles Vanhoutte for Cercle Brugge has been booked by Christof Dierick and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway. Kortrijk with the kick-off.
Petar Golubovic is booked for the away team.
In the minute 67, Goal! Faiz Selemani gives Kortrijk a 0-1 lead.
Anthony Musaba is replacing Kylian Hazard for Cercle Brugge at Jan Breydel Stadium.
Paul Clement (Cercle Brugge) is making a second substitution, with Thibo Somers replacing Ike Ugbo.
In the minute 76, The away team have replaced Faiz Selemani with Abdul Ajagun. This is the first substitution made today by Yves Vanderhaeghe.
Alimani Gory is on a sub for Charles Vanhoutte for Cercle Brugge.
Christof Dierick blows to end the match. The final score is 0-1.
